root.name: getIntAttribute()
root.description: Returns an integer attribute of the element. If the default parameter is used and the attribute doesn't exist, the default value is returned. When using the version of the method without the default parameter, if the attribute doesn't exist, the value 0 is returned.

parameter.label: name
parameter.description: String: the name of the attribute

parameter.label: default
parameter.description: int: value returned if the attribute is not found
